   function mobilecheck() {
            return /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini|Mobi/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ||
                screen.width < 500;
        }
        function getParameter (param) {
            let search = window.location.search
            let obj = {}
            search = search.substr(1, search.length).split('&')
            for (let i = 0; i < search.length; i++) {
                let key = search[i].split('=')[0]
                let value = search[i].split('=')[1]
                obj[key] = value
            }
            return obj[param]
        }
        function ua () {
            var ua = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();//获取判断用的对象
            if (ua.indexOf('micromessenger') > -1 && ua.indexOf('wxwork') > -1) {
                // 在微信中打开
                return 'wx'
            }
            return 'qt'
        }
        function goto_client() {
            var HTML_SITE = 'site';
            var EQX = '//www.eqxiu.com';
            var WAP = '//wap.eqxiu.com';
            // 兼容已经推广出去的老url
            var pathName = location.pathname;
            var paramString = location.search;

            if(mobilecheck()) {
                location.href = WAP + '/wpmall';
            } else {
                var pathString = ['/companyreg', '/region', '/about', '/upgrade/person', '/privilege', '/show'];
                if (pathString.indexOf(HTML_SITE) === -1 && pathString.indexOf(pathName) !== -1) {
                    location.href = EQX + HTML_SITE + pathName + paramString;
                }
            }
        }
        (function () {
            var WAP = '//wap.eqxiu.com';
            const uuid = getParameter('uuid') || ''
            if (uuid) return
            if(ua() !== 'wx') {
                goto_client()
            } else if (ua() === 'wx' && mobilecheck()) {
                window.location.href = WAP + '/wpmall';
            }
        })();
        (function(config) {
          window.AnalysysAgent = window.AnalysysAgent || []
          window.AnalysysAgent.methods = 'identify alias reset track profileSet profileSetOnce profileIncrement profileAppend profileUnset profileDelete registerSuperProperty registerSuperProperties unRegisterSuperProperty clearSuperProperties getSuperProperty getSuperProperties pageView debugMode auto appkey name uploadURL hash visitorConfigURL autoProfile autoWebstay encryptType pageProperty autoHeatmap freeApi'.split(' ');
          function factory(b) {
              return function() {
                  var a = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
                  a.unshift(b);
                  window.AnalysysAgent.push(a);
                  return window.AnalysysAgent;
              }
          };
          for (var i = 0; i < AnalysysAgent.methods.length; i++) {
              var key = window.AnalysysAgent.methods[i];
              AnalysysAgent[key] = factory(key);
          }
          for (var key in config) {
              AnalysysAgent[key](config[key])
          }
      })({
